Comment 26: 
Just 2 days of debugging to discover that it's... drumroll... unaligned 64-bit atomic...
again!

Episodically GC sweeps some spans twice, and episodically it leads to double free. It
perfectly explains all the crashes we see, a lot of crashes in freelists, crashes only
on 386 and only with GOMAXPROCS>1.
_Owner changed to @dvyukov._
